subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|なわ|yomi=k}}
From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なわ|-}}. Derived from verb {{m|ja|綯う|tr=nau||to [[plait]] or twist together into [[twine]] or line}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=繩|なわ|hhira=なは}}

# a [[rope]], a flexible, heavy cord of tightly intertwined hemp or other fiber
